text: The 2017 World Fencing Championships was held at the Arena Leipzig in Leipzig, Germany from 19 to 26 July 2017. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%;" |- |bgcolor=#00cc33| ● ||Opening Ceremony|| bgcolor=#d0a9f5| Q||Qualifying || bgcolor=#ffcc00| ● ||Finals||bgcolor=#ee3333| ● ||Closing Ceremony |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%; line-height:1.25em;" |- ! colspan="2" | July !! 19 !! 20 !! 21 !! 22 !! 23 !! 24 !! 25 !! 26 !!
